actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-18.

official_title: Resolution authorizing the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries to conduct certain studies and investigations.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries to conduct studies and investigations; and to make inquiries on matters within its jurisdiction as set forth in the Rules of the House of Representatives. Requires the committee to report to Congress, not later than January 2, 1975, on its activities during the 93rd Congress.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries to conduct certain studies and investigations.
